author: gdaniels
msg: A little sample illustrating a way to integrate a custom data type (a struct)

author: gdaniels
msg: First cut at a more real encoding system, which supports mapping arbitrary
types to serializers/deserializers.  Needs cleanup (especially in terms of
how the various pieces learn about each other), but the basic structure
works.  See samples/encoding for a demo of encoding a custom data

author: dug
msg: Message type is Bytes not String

author: rubys
msg: Probably shouldn't close the file just yet!
Where to close the file is actually a bit of a problem...it can't be after
it is read as this is common code on the server which needs the socket to
stick around until the response is complete.  And by the time the client
gets control back, the copy of the InputStream in the Message has been
